channel.title: No-ip adress
channel.description:
hello guyz can some1 plz tell me where can i put my no-op address in server script?
my ip adress is rsprivaate.no-ip.org i'ev heard ppl say open up client.java and find 127.0.0.1 and change that with the no-ip
and more ppl say go to server.java and change it in there
here is the client.java where i can edit 127.0.0.1
first it comes here
[code]public int playerLastLogin = 20060101; public String lastlogin = "127.0.0.1"; public int lastlogintime;[/code]
and 2nd it comes here
[code] if (playerName.startsWith("Mod Allstar") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Allstar") && !connectedFrom.equals("127.0.0.1")) {[/code]
here is the server.java
[code] if (/* connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1")*/true) { if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing") || connectingHost.startsWith("server2")) {[/code]
so can any1 plzzzzzz tell me where do i put the server ip adress :eg : rsprivateserver.no-ip.org?
i will really appreciate it thanks!

item.title: No-ip adress
item.dc:creator: @n0_limit_k0 n0_limit_k0
item.description:
@n0_limit_k0 wrote:

look up how alstar how? im not trying to leech this is the first time im jus checking if i can make a server or not i will make my own tho this is jus for testing meself

item.title: No-ip adress
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Instead, look up allstar and replace anything with the ip address with yours and anything with Mod allstar or soemthing like that with your name, leeching… yes to start, who cares?

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip adress
item.dc:creator: @n0_limit_k0 n0_limit_k0
item.description:
@n0_limit_k0 wrote:

hello guyz can some1 plz tell me where can i put my no-op address in server script?

my ip adress is rsprivaate.no-ip.org
i’ev heard ppl say open up client.java and find 127.0.0.1 and change that with the no-ip

and more ppl say go to server.java and change it in there

here is the client.java where i can edit 127.0.0.1

first it comes here

public int playerLastLogin = 20060101; public String lastlogin = "127.0.0.1"; public int lastlogintime;

and 2nd it comes here

if (playerName.startsWith("Mod Allstar") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Allstar") && !connectedFrom.equals("127.0.0.1")) {

here is the server.java

if (/* connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1")*/true) { if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing") || connectingHost.startsWith("server2")) {

so can any1 plzzzzzz tell me where do i put the server ip adress :eg : rsprivateserver.no-ip.org?

i will really appreciate it thanks!

Read full topic
